HiddenText.Name: I am an Online Degree student. Do I need to defer when I leave on my mission?
HiddenText.OpenningText: I am an Online Degree student. Do I need to defer when I leave on my mission?
HiddenText.BodyCopy: No. If you are leaving on a mission, you do not need to defer a semester. You will simply have to reapply on BeSmart.com for the new semester. An updated ecclesiastical endorsement is required.
